Accept my warmest thanks for the graceful manner in which as well publicly
At the Acclimatisation Society? check minutes.
as privately you adressed me in bidding me farewell. My departure for home
Trip to Europe and Great Britain. is not quite positively fixed, since I find it difficult to provide in my department for all my duties during a longer absence and I confess to you, there are moreover ties which endear this country even more than ever.
A reference to his engagement to Euphemia.

If however anything was wanting to augment the love, which I have imbibed for Australia, it is your manifestation and that of other dear friends of kindful feeling towards myself, feelings of interest in my fate by which I feel so honoured, that, if providence grants me life and health, I shall struggle to deserve more than hitherto the proud position into which I have been placed.

Should I not have an opportunity in the event of my departure to bid you personally goodbye, let me assure you that my best wishes for you will follow you & that I look forward with delight to the time when I again shall enjoy your friendship.
